content.detailedDescription:
I purchased a new canon 7d three weeks ago.  i've taken over 1200 random photos in my spare time throughout the day and evening since my purchase. i've been very much into photography and have been trying to learn as much as i can recently. 

on this particular day i walked out on to the deck in my back yard and started looking for a subject to practice.  i noticed a small bird up in a tree in a north, north east direction up on a hill. the base of the tree would be approximately 100 yards from my position and approximately 15 yards higher. i set the camera to 100 iso,f/36 and a shutter speed of 1/20. i zoomed in to 85mm which was max for that lens.  

i focused in on the bird and the tree and luckily decided to pan to the right (east) for better composition. i noticed nothing unusual about the shot. i snapped a few more shots and went inside.  

i don't recall but it was either later that evening or the next day that i noticed the strange objects in the shot. to the best of my knowledge the objects i captured in this shot were not visible to the naked eye or through my viewfinder.  i should also add, the viewfinder has 100% coverage.  although i wasn't looking for anything else, i'm usually pretty observant when it comes to my shots.    

i was very excited. not only did i have one strange object, but two.  i presumed the one object with the trail could have been a jet but there is still something kind of odd about it. normally you can slightly see the shape or outline of a conventional jet during the day, and there isn't usually such a bright, distinct, large and round light like this. never the less this could be reflection from the sun.  

as far as the black object above, i haven't got a clue. could be the genuine article.  

to make things even more interesting.  i checked the other photos that i took during the same shoot and i found something else. i found what looks like a jet flying almost vertical towards the ground. you'll notice that it was almost at the very same moment and same position as the other photo. (same tree and same bird)

i've sent these images to friends and family and we thought perhaps jet had been scrambled to check out or intercept this black ufo.  

i should also add this.  i am very meticulous about my equipment. i clean my lens before every shoot.  also there were no reflective objects or surfaces in front of or anywhere near the camera.  only a large field.  

i know we could be reaching, but these photos do show what look to be two jets and a very strange object, with one of the jets near the object and the other performing an abnormal maneuver.

what do you guys think?
content.summary: Photographed flying objects unknowingly

content.detailedDescription: Still shook up thinking about it!!!! here is my girlfriend and i personal experience...... we have been watchin tha skies alot lately.... alot of weird lights in sky. anyway on this particular night i was outside smoking. my gf was in r apt and i called her on her cell 2 tell her to check out this bright red pulsating lights.... i felt likw someone was listening to our phone call.... very creepy :( she came outside n tha thing disappeared. we were talking and next thing we kno she tells me to look up and this triangle object steel grey looking no,lights or sound is hovering and headed towards us!!!!! it hov erred over our heads we ran inside because we were scared to death!!!! i have a very uneasy feeling about it and im scared. we told a few people but they think were crazy. it was too close n i feel like something isnt right :(
content.summary: I feel like they can hear us and our thoughts......Very unsettling!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Friday, october 21st i arrived home from work at a later than normal hour, nearly 11pm. my wife had been home for some time playing with a small kitten we had adopted. she tells me that there would be a meteor shower, something about haley's comet trail breakup near orions belt. we live in south florida near enough to the ft lauderdale inter-coastal and nearby beach that looking south east we are just a small distance inland. this is where she believed orion's belt should be, but i found out later we were looking toward where the constellation would appear (a few hours later). right before we had ran out behind our house i picked up the small kitten and walked out, my wife was pissed that i insisted the kitten came out (for the first time and without mommy approval). we walked to the east toward our fence line to look toward the area we thought the meteors may be. i was lacking behind and stopped scanning the sky. as i walked backwards and turned around a mistyness was apparent. until this time planes also buzzed around as we have two large airports both north and south. detail point:  when planes come in to the southern airport they will always make landings from the east from over the ocean or west from the everglades. through this mistyness i saw three slow moving orbs, which made me double take and call out to my wife. asking if she saw that she replied she saw it. to her point of view she saw a different object and form. i saw from below and as i walked nearer the object was slightly more overhead, but still my guess a block west, maybe more, and below clouds but shrouded in mist, moved without noise. there were three lights which played tricks on my eyes, tried to "hide" in a triangle shape, then as i moved closer i noticed a smaller formation lights/triangle just to the left/east of the larger one. now more below i look up, the lights appear to be part of a flat black triangle object which the lights are framed by. the smaller also looked that way. i couldn't for sure tell if the lights were each an object or two triangle craft, or a larger craft with multiple lights really. it moved slow but sure south, toward the airport, which would certainly interfere with aircraft landing. it was not really high enough to be a airplane and should have made noise as low as it was. once out of sight, the mist seemed to fade away after a while revealing the actual cloud cover which was a differnt color and texture than when this object passed. from then untill much later i saw no craft in the air, twenty minutes later off the coast i am sure a orange fast moving light short south. i expected to see some sort of military plane, this may have been one, but also was silent and moved south either along the beach or offshore. still for another hour at least i saw no airplane activity to the south. finally a jet plane (had the shape but not sure, flew kinda low) passed directly over me as i lay on my ground outback for well over an hour. stayed out until 2am and saw nothing else.
content.summary: Orange/red lights objects or linked as one formed large triange form & smaller triangle of 3 orbs each

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony facing east.  directly north, approximately over des plains or skokie, i saw a large whitish light.  the light was twinkling somewhat in the lower atmosphere and appeared sometimes orange or reddish.  i thought it was a plane at first.  it was hovering around the treetops, directly in the path where commercial traffic approaches o'hare.  i thought it was a plane approaching from the north because the light was so bright, which is unusual and caught my attention because traffic typically approaches from south east and then veers west towards o'hare.  a jet was taking off at the same time, traveling east.  the jet crossed in front of the light (i could see the silhouette), and all the normal lights were on, so i couldn't help but notice how much smaller the jet seemed in comparison to the ball of light.  the light slowly ascended at that point and completely disappeared.  like someone switched off a lamp.  it did not go into the clouds - it looked completely different than that.  it just disappeared.  then it seemed liked something else was where the light used to be.  i'm not sure if transparent is the right word, but the only other accurate word i can use is "cloaked".  i could see it moving, but it was close to the same color as the sky, and occasionally i saw dim specks of light near it.  if you blink, you'd miss it the specks of light.  it moved out of my field of vision within seconds.  attached is an example i created in photoshop.  i tried to keep the scale similar to the objects i saw.

earlier this week, on 10/24/11 at approximately 7 or 8 pm, i saw a similar cloaked object traveling from north to south in the upper atmosphere.  i thought it was a dim satellite until it made a sharp angle west - like it turned on a dime - and went faster than anything i've ever seen in my life. the speed was instantaneous.  it corkscrewed straight up and i lost sight of it.  i've seen several objects similar to this, but none as fast.  it was pretty cool.

do satellites ever make sharp turns?  i thought they only went in straight paths.  thanks for your help.
content.summary: White light hovered, slowly ascended and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out back door of home to have a smoke.  a few stars were visible among the clouds and then i saw 3 white orbs dancing around one another.  in relation to visible stars, they were about the same in size.  they darted around and at one point two of them apparently merged and that combo got a little bigger.  then they separated.  watched the 3 of them for about eight minutes.  no camera available for pix, but doubt they would appear as other than those streaky lights you see on the ufo tv shows anyway.  finished my cigarette and went back in house.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 dancing lights above me

content.detailedDescription: Thursday, october 27, 2011, approximately 10:10 pm.  my daughter went outside to take the trash hopper to the road side to be picked up in the morning. she went outside and walked in the direction of the trash can, towards the east.  then she saw a light above her head.  she looked up and saw a triangle shaped object with a blue light at the tip and two white lights at the other tips.  the craft was spinning in a counter clockwise motion while it was slowly moving in an east bound direction.  she observed the object for about 40 seconds.  turned around to call my mother to come look and then turned back around to look at the object again and she saw it rapidly moving away towards the east.  she rushes back into the house and ran up stairs to tell me what had just happened.  she was startled and excited.  she told me what she saw then i went outside to have her show me exactly where she saw it and describe it to me.  we were standing out by the trash can, she was describing it to me, and there was a car coming down the road and just suddenly stopped about 200 feet from our drive way.  the headlights were on, the vehicle was still running, and it was just sitting there in the road.  i decided i would walk the trash out to the road and get a better look at why this car was stopped in the middle of road like it was.  i get down to the end of the drive way and expect to see deer crossing in front of the vehicle, something like that.  there was nothing else in the road.  so i thought maybe they saw whatever my daughter just did and maybe it was still there.  i looked up into the sky and i didnt see anything.  but the vehicle still remained stopped in the middle of the road.  and i had no idea why.  i walked back up to the house and told my mother to come and look at this car that was just sitting in the road.  she did.  the vehicle remained in the middle of the road for about 90 seconds and then preceded on at a low speed.  when it drove in front of the house i could see it was a dark color suv, looked like a ford model.  and that was it.  very strange.
content.summary: Triangle object, three lights, spinning

content.detailedDescription: On 10/23/11 i witnessed seeing a ufo, approximately 2:00pm in san antonio, texas. we were heading back home,we headed south on ih 35 south,my husband was the first to notice the flying object.He told be to look to the right of me, and asked me "what does that look like to you,it doesn't look like a plane". when i looked a saw a shiny,metalic flying object,i tried to keep my eyes on it by it would disappear then reappear.It didn't look like no plane, i have never seen anything like it, i told my daughter who was in the back seat to look ,she witnessed the same thing. we tried to keep our eyes on it, but we eventually lost it.
content.summary: Metalic ufo sighting in san antonio,texas

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house in plainview tx. i was outside having a smoke, when i noticed an object moving east just to the north of me. the object could not have been more than 15,000 feet up. it had 3 very bright lights amber in color but no strobes like an airplane or helo which caught my attention. the object made no sound what so ever. i could not make out the shape of object even though it was a clear night. the object moved in a straight line never changing direction or altitude and kept a steady speed slower than a commercial jet. i watched the object for approximately 5 minutes till it went out of sight over other houses. i was in shock cause i have never seen a ufo before. i'm still trouble by what i saw. since that sighting i have had another approx a month or two later at approx the same time in a different city 50 miles south of plainview. i'm at a loss for what i have seen. even scared at times, and watch the skies constantly.
content.summary: It was moving west to east , making no noise, no strobe lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the intersection of grange hall rd and pentagon blvd in beavercreek, ohio. as an astronomer, it is a habit of mine to look up at the night sky as often as possible that night i looked into the eastern sky and noticed 10 glowing, pulsing, red lights in the sky over the city. my experience told me that what i was looking at was not natural and i immediately pulled out my ipod touch and began filming the lights. i wondered if the lights could be the remains of the rosat satellite which was due to fall that night, but my later analysis determined that it was impossible. i believed that what i was seeing was not of terrestrial origin, but i knew that i would have to conduct a thorough analysis of my video data to verify that. i watched as the lights drifted silently across the sky. they appeared to be extremely high in the atmosphere as the moved slowly against the backdrop of streetlights and trees.

i was excited and terrified as i watched the objects drift across the sky. i silently cursed myself for not carrying a better camera with me, but i worked with what i had. i made sure to note that jupiter is the center light in the last few seconds of the video and tried to give coordinates and degrees for the objects, but my fear and excitement caused me to get most of them wrong.

the objects eventually vanished one at a time as if in some kind of sequence before disappearing altogether. i contacted the beavercreek police department and asked if they had received any reports of strange lights in the sky, but they replied that nobody had called. the dispatcher noted that a meteor shower was due that night. since then, rosat was confirmed to have gone down over india and the orionid meteor shower which was due to be prominent that night was nowhere near that region of the sky.
content.summary: Strange lights over beavercreek, ohio

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Some lights went around us and left
content.summary: It just flew above us

content.detailedDescription: Its like icecream  cone hovering  overthe houses
content.summary: Its like icecream  cone

content.detailedDescription: I looked up with my binoculars, wow! first time i've seen one sooo close with binoculars. massive, was also seen by mexican officials and airlines during the same time span. been ufo watcher for years, but this is my first encounter up so close!
content.summary: Oval shape or saucer with emmiting lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on argentine rd in early afternoon on a clear autumn day, with my 10 year old daughter and 12 year old step-daughter in the back seat.
suddenly, my step-daughter said "what is that?" as she looked east out her window. i could not see the object from my position, so i lowered my head and slowed down. i could see a very bright sliver of movement above the trees to the east, approx 1/2 mile away. i pulled over to the side of the road, and got out of the car.  the three of us witnessed a very very large silver disc moving slowly above the trees,heading north. this object was impossibly large; i would say it had to be 300-500 feet wide. i am 5'5" tall, and spread my arms out wide; it was as wide as that from where i stood. it was so bright it was hard to look at without sunglasses. (which we were all wearing)
then, the object suddenly accelerated north at great speed. we all jumped back into the car and raced north to see how far it would go. we lost sight of it almost immediately . 10 miles ahead, we saw a group of people standing in the road, and we stopped to see what was going on. the people there had been observing this same craft for over an hour, and had stationed a watcher 15 miles back at m-59, who had a walkie-talkie; where they were communicating with each other on the location of the craft. according to the group, the craft had been moving at high rates of speed. the man at m-59 would report to the man stationed 15 miles north when he saw the craft zoom north again; the man 15 miles north reported that several times the craft had made the 15 mile trip in 6.5 seconds.   
we stood and watched this craft with the local police for over an hour, until it suddenly stopped, then zoomed straight up, and was gone.
by the time it departed, there were approx 50 people standing there.
content.summary: Enormous silver disc flying at impossible speeds above tree line.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1945est, i observed something very strange. i was on my porch when i happen to notice an object that appeared to look like a start, but was moving across the sky. as i was trying to find characteristics of an aircraft (flashing lights, movement) it all of a sudden illuminated into a bright white light the size of a basketball. the brightness lasted for about 10-15 seconds. i couldn't speak so i was beating on the door for my boyfriend to witness what was happening. unfortunately, the object dimmed back into the original size, light pattern and continued it's northern cross across the sky.It even appeared to cross straight into the flight path of a plane that was crossing the sky. upon standing outside for 10 minutes trying to see it again, we witnessed it coming back the opposite direction at a high rate of speed until we lost visual. i am not sure what i saw and am still very shaken up over this incident. i know that if anyone else was skygazing last night around this timeframe, they would have seen it as well.
content.summary: Moving starlike object quickly brightens, then goes back to original state

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friends were standing outside. it was diwali yesterday so everyone was burning fireworks and socializing. suddenly a friend pointed towards the sky and a very bright object was moving across the sky. at first we thought it's some firework but it kept moving. it didn't look like an aeroplane, was way too bright. then within another 5 mins a similar object crossed the sky. we rushed to the terrace and we could see it in a distant corner of the sky. and while we were looking at it, we saw that there was another one nearby. they were moving in the sky but were very far off from us. then they disappeared. and just as we were leaving suddenly one of those popped up again and this time very bright and nearby. it crossed the sky and then got dimmer and dimmer and vanished again. again after 10 minutes it came back. but this time from the opposite side and again crossed the whole sky. and i haven't seen anything like it. it was so different.  
i captured a lot of photos and videos. i've written a blog about the event -

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright reddish-white glowing ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends house and i was taking supply rd to fife lake. i noticed when i had almost reached williamsburg rd that there was a bright light in the sky, at first it was so low i thought it was part of a tower that might have been worked on or something, but it peaked my interest so i kept an eye on it as best i could. after i passed the williamsburg rd turnoff i descended into the valley before the first turn by twin lake, and by the i realized that it was an object hovering over the lake. i did the best i could to pull over and get a good look at it, and when i actually stopped the vehicle and shut it off and stepped out to view it, i got a good look at it. it was a triangular looking craft, at least thats what the light pattern made it look like. the lights that were smaller on it were blinking very quickly, and it had a bigger orange-red light that was fairly bright. at first i thought it might be a helicopter, but it did not produce any sound. after i watched it for 20 seconds or so, it took off very quickly to the other side of the lake, and just barely out of my clear view, and the way it moved told me i had witnessed something abnormal...Nothing of this world could possibly move that quickly and smoothly while remaining completely quiet. i've seen several ufos after i started looking for them, but they have always been star-like or orbs very high up...I always dreamed of seeing something like this, but honestly having seen it, it really freaked me out at the time, i guess you can never really know until it happens, and i never thought it would, but it was an incredible experience that i will never forget
content.summary: Triangular object seen hovering over twin lake on supply road

content.detailedDescription: After getting off work that night, i was sitting on the back deck with my binoculars and two dauchshunds. i spotted the object approaching from the north, moving pretty slowly. thought it might be aircraft due to formation of lights along wings, but all lights were beautiful kelly-green and pulsating, the whole object being boomerang-shaped. it was close to the horizon (from my elevation it appeared to be at approx. 15-20 degrees above tree level) moving south apparently along the local state highway. at approx. a mile north of our exit, it appeared to hover and veer slightly toward the west (toward my location) my dauchshunds had begun to whimper and gathered beneath my chair, the male's hair up along the back. at this time, the object still had to have been at least a mile and a half away but the dogs seemed to sense it. during this same time, there was a commercial airliner flying from west to east at a typical altitude and i was able to compare the two, no comparison. the general shape was similar to conventional aircraft but the light configuration was way wrong and i could not make out an actual fusilage. there is a lot of commercial traffic moving from west to east to the south of our location but this object seemed to fly along the highway. i became pretty excited when i realized this might not be an airplane! i stood up and went to the far southeast corner of the deck to try to keep it in sight longer. i think it hovered approx. 1 to 1 1/2 minutes, then resumed it's slow path south. eventually it curved off to the southeast and slowly went out of sight. the dogs insisted on going back indoors and would not go back out that night
content.summary: Flight path seemed parallel to hwy 177 southbound hovered about buckstitch rd and resumed flight

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in dec of 1990. i was in the us army at the time near the end of flight school. i was stationed at fort rucker, alabama. this took place inside the barracks in our room. there were three of us in the room at the time. it was in the middle of the night, not sure what time. there were two bunk beds in the room. i was on the top bunk with my room mate on the bottom. the other bunk bed held my other room mate, he slept on the bottom. i awoke that evening, looking towards the door, seeing an entity next to the door to our room. i assumed it was "guarding" the area. the immediate thought that ran through my head was to make a lot of noise, trying to wake my roomy's and possibly get others to come into the room. but then i thought that if i were sleeping/dreaming i would look like a real idiot, so i passed on that idea. i then looked over to my right and saw the shadow of a second entity. apparently this one was "working" on my room mate on the bunk below me. i have no idea what it was doing, but it was moving at an incredible speed. i had the sense that there was a third entity in the room although i couldn't see it.
i then decided the take advantage of the situation and get a good look at this thing by the door. the first thing i noticed was that the middle hinge on the door was exactly how tall this thing was. after looking this thing over for about a minute or two, it saw me awake. it didn't take long for it to notice me either. it pointed in my direction and moved its mouth (as if yelling or talking or whatever to the other entity's) telling them i was awake. at that point a thought came to me that if i closed my eyes they may think i was asleep and leave me alone. after what seemed only a few seconds i opened my eyes again and everything was gone. of course i assumed i was dreaming but when i opened my eyes, i was in the same exact position, looking the same way i was before. 
the next day my other roommate (not the one "worked on") noticed some welts on my back. there were three of them. i laughed it off, but never took the time to look at the welts in the mirror. 
i would like to be contacted by a mufon investigator about this incident, please.
content.summary: Entity encoutner

content.detailedDescription: Driving in cal. looked up & saw bright light in sky moving east. told the wife to take picture with cell phone. i knew right away that it was a ufo as i have seen it in az. a couple of times. but the wife has never seen one until now.I forgot that she took the picture & when i downloaded it you can clearly see that it is a rectangled, very bright object.It kept flying east & we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Very bright object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out at night to take photos of our cactus plant that only blooms at night.  there were five bright, colorful balls of light that flashed across the night sky.  they all left trails, as if traveling at a high rate of speed.  one ball was bright orange, one violet, one white w/cobalt hue, one was a dimmer/darker shade of orange (as if farther away, and not as bright), and another was sort of gray and dimmer as well.  seven photographs were taken in immediate, rapid succession, but only the first photo revealed these balls of light.  the other six photos just showed a dark, sky w/no stars.  these lights must have been traveling at an extremely high rate of speed because they were not visible with the naked eye, and i only saw them in my photograph once developed.
see photos at facebook website:

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Five balls of brightly colored lights, leaving trails across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Hoboken, new jersey- ufo sighting ��� 11:00- 11:15 pm on 23 august 2011
as a daily routine, my family and i were walking in our balcony on the third floor, when my daughter pointed at a distant blue, green and red light that was shining very bright in the sky. this object was approaching us with great speed. at this moment there were atleast 5-6 aircrafts flying in all directions. however, this particularly bright object caught our attention and we stood there trying to figure out about the shape and brightness of the object. the object stopped abruptly. it appeared as if it is hovering a few hundred feet above the buildings. the green and red light of the object were a lot similar to the traffic lights but much brighter as it was piercing my eyes when it came close. the blue light was rarely seen but extremely bright. 
finally, the object moved and it crossed over our building. we thought we missed the object. we did not have our camera at this point. my family and i became suspicious about what we were witnessing and decided to wait there for the object to show up. to our surprise, the object appeared again from a different direction this time. it stood at an angle of 45 degree and it almost felt like the object was observing us this time. the object was in this stationary position for atleast 4-5 minutes. at this moment, we got our camera and took 6 photographs. the lights of the object were sequentially blinking. first it was green and then after sometime extremely bright red light. it was changing colors and we could see the shape of the object was not like an aero plane.  the pictures are better predictors of shape. one more observation that i had was, the object made absolutely no noise when it over our building. at around 11.15 pm the object silently glided away over our roof and disappeared.
the object was sighted apart from me by my wife and 2 adult children. we are very curious to know about what we sighted on this day.
content.summary: Our family observed a bright light object that changed colors for 15 minutes in hoboken

content.detailedDescription:
Was attending dinner party approx time of event 9 and 10 pm eastern time over looking the entrance to tampa bay egmont key light was visible to the left approx 45 degrees to the left of the observed object attempting to call attention to other person present to no avail object gave off steady reddish yellow light low elevation beyond edmont key greater than 5 miles traveled approx due north at extreme speed changed direction approx 90 degrees into a vertical climb and then disappeared 

entire event approx lasted less than 10 seconds 


would like to know if any other individuals witnessed this event ?
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Unknown
content.summary: Looked very similar to a standard missile launch  except for flight trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
This goes back about 13 years to when i was returning from a business trip. at the time i was a software engineer, and am currently a senior software engineer for an automotive engineering firm outside of detroit. i'm sure that also contributes to the delay - it's not something generally discussed in technical circles, or anywhere for that matter. lately i've heard a few stories about large craft in clouds, so i feel compelled to share what i witnessed that day...
i was returning home from a customer system installation on a friday en-route to detroit mi from charlotte sc at approximately 6:00pm est. my flight was somewhere around 33,000' near the southern border of ohio. the cloud cover below was 100% with the majority of the cloud tops what i'd estimate to be 5,000' (i'll call it the cloud floor). there were several towering cumulus clouds extending from the floor to our flight level and higher.
i had a window seat and was enjoying watching the clouds and other air traffic go by below. i remember noticing other passenger airlines, such as a dc-9, traveling just above the cloud layer and that it's relative distance away made it appear to be about the same size as if an ant were on my window.
then, i noticed a huge dark solid object seem to inadvertently protrude from near the base of one of the large cumulus clouds below. from my viewing angle, it was 25-30 degrees to the left of our flight path at approximately 45 degrees below my observation point. i remember having a laser pointer in my hand and deciding it might not be a good idea to acknowledge it's presence. (6 miles above the surface isn't a good place to find out if they minded being spotted. this was also before lasers became a problem...)
the craft was still partially concealed within the cloud, yet the part that was visible was about 4 commercial jetliners length in diameter (400-500 feet)! it was roughly round, but had 2 large 'bumps' - so it basically resembled a 'chocolate turtle'. (it certainly wasn't a large candy covered pile of nuts, but that's just what it looked like.)
it slowly drifted out of the clouds for only about 3-4 seconds, then appeared to realize it was losing it's cover, then slipped right back in to the cloud base. the movement out and back in to the cloud was at a slow pace. the entire incident lasted about 5 seconds - half the time was spent uncovering itself, then other half was moving back in. no sudden movements, just a smooth partially out, then back in.
if there were any other witnesses on that or any of the other passing flights, i am unaware of them.
it was by no means a scary situation, but the only thing that caused me any concern was what their reaction might have been if i had shined my little laser beam on them. if i was on the ground, i would definitely 'point' them out. if it provoked a response, anything short of death would be worth it to me because then it would be my proof. although common sense tells me it's impossible other life doesn't exist, i'd just really like to witness it up close for myself.
content.summary: Huge ufo hiding in cloud bank

content.detailedDescription:
I went out at night to take photos of our cactus plant that only blooms at night.  there were five bright, colorful balls of light flashed across the night sky.  they all left trails, as if traveling at a high rate of speed.  one ball was bright orange, one violet, one white w/cobalt hue, one was a dimmer/darker shade of orange (as if farther away, and not as bright), and another was sort of gray and dimmer as well.  seven photographs were taken in immediate, rapid succession, but only the first photo revealed these balls of light.  the other six photos just showed a dark, sky w/no stars.  these lights must have been traveling at an extremely high rate of speed because they were not visible with the naked eye, and i only saw them in my pictures once developed.
photos can be seen on facebook page at:  
[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Five balls of different colored lights caught on digital camera speeding through the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: The disk like shape in the sky was at a bought 20 degrees in the sky facing west,towards the cascade range; the light grey appearance would change, to lighter to darker gray as the object moved and tilted in large circle track,, at times the object would partially appear solid and transparent as it turned in slow large sweeping turn and tilted.. tried to view with binoculars ,could not view ..Went back and forth from field glass to naked  eye..Could only see the object with naked eye.. object left or was out of sight could not tell. this object was stunning, witch left an uncomfortable feeling of unknown..It seemed as if the object had an intentional holding or hovering pattern ...
content.summary: As i drove to town i saw a unidentified object in the sky light to dark gray object

content.detailedDescription: Hi,i live in billings, mt. last night around 11:30 pm, my husband and i were sitting on our patio. i looked up at the sky and noticed a big bright "star" saying, "wow, that is awfully close and bright to be a star." also, it was somewhat cloudy out and there was little if any stars to be seen. my husband then figured it must be a satelite. we watched it closely and it appeared to be moving and slowly getting closer. it was still far, far away but it was so bright and looked as though it had white "spikes" of light. 8 of them to be exact. we quickly took pictures and this one came out the best. however, it does not capture the brilliance of light that we saw nor the "aura" spikes of light. in fact,  when its zoomed in on it reminds me of a jellyfish lol. we went back inside for about 5 minutes and decided to come back outside to try and get another picture. right then, it was moving quicker back into the sky and then all the sudden it speeded up and poof!....It was gone.
content.summary: Bright light like a star

content.detailedDescription:
First, let me state that i only file this report at the urging of my sons, otherwise, i would not.  the experience of seeing these "things" has left me with mixed emotions and somewhat upset.  when i think of the affect of the third observance listed below, the hair on my neck stands up and i get cold chills!

i filed my first mufon report with the assistance of my eldest son regarding the two ufos observed on friday night, oct. 21. this report covers three separate observations from my property during saturday night, oct. 22. they occurred at different times and locations in the sky, and were different in color, behavior and size.  the weather was clear on this night, just like the night before. 

first sighting:  at 7:55 pm, i took my dog outside to potty as usual, and while walking to the edge of my front yard near the street i looked north toward read mountain where the ufos were spotted the previous night.  it wasn't long before i spotted a vivid red ball of light that seemed to be hovering in the general area as the night before.  however, this one seemed smaller in size to me, but it was the same cherry red color and looked by the naked eye to be changing color to a blueish green with bright blue-white lights that appeared to sort of surround the object but was more underneath the other colors.  i took my dog in, grabbed my binoculars and immediately went back to the street to observe the object.  i made myself a promise that if i saw another ufo, i was going to get one of my neighbors to witness it with me.  so, once i confirmed that it was indeed a similar, if not the same object, i ran up to my neighbors house, range their doorbell and asked them to come outside to see the object hovering over the mountain.  both agreed that the object was moving slowly, changing colors (red, blue, yellow and green, with sparks of blue-white).  we observed this for about 5-10 mins, and i shared with them my experience from the night before.  the object just "blinked" out and we continued to observe the sky and talk.  they went inside and i started walking across the street when another "object" appeared slightly above me, but it was only randomly shooting out sparks of blue-white light that reminded me of the 4th of july sparklers that kids love.  then it was gone!  i went back inside promising myself i would not go out again, but the thought of seeing something again was just to strong.

second sighting:  around 8:35 pm, i walked back outside to check the sky (without binoculars).  after about 5 mins or so, as i was looking to the south of my house, over the tree line a saw a bright, blueish-white light just "blink" into existence.  shortly thereafter, it began to slowly move to the east, seemingly tracking the valley that runs from roanoke to bedford (rt 460).  as i watched this "object" another bright, blueish-white light "blinked" into existence about where the previous one started, and it began to follow the first one to the east down the valley.  i'm thinking "what the heck???!!!" when yet a third bright, blueish-white light "blinked" into existence, but it was offset to the northwest and it just appeared to hover and blink, and it did not follow the other two "objects".  i observed it for a few minutes and it began to move in a zig-zag pattern.  at this point, i had just about had more than i could handle with these "things" and i went inside, feeling a little on edge because i was by myself.  

third sighting:  around 9:15 pm, in spite of my better judgment, i once again wanted to check the sky.  i walked to the street in front of my house (without binoculars) and stood for a short while, observing the stars and airplanes flying at high altitude which were basically flying from northeast to the southwest.  i paid particular attention to the sound that soon followed them.  please note that i never heard any sound whatsoever coming from any of the "objects" that i observed the night before or on this night.  i was about to turn and go back inside when almost directly above me, a flash of electric, vivid blue-white light shot out like an arc welder, and it appeared to drop down in a spiral and "burn out".  it sort of reminded me of lightening.  within seconds, another shot out not far from it; then another and another in rapid succession and in different places.  some of the sparks seemed to spiral to the side, rather than drop down.  these shooting sparks seemed to come from a large, but "confined" area or at least seemed they were contained within a large parameter.  this "object??" where the sparks were emanating from began to move in zig-zag directions and throughout large swath of the sky.  either this "object" was very low in altitude or it was very, very large!  because of its size or nearness to me, i began to feel very ill at ease and soon felt sick to my stomach.  i said to myself, "i've seen enough, i don't want to see anymore, i don't want to see anymore!"  i all but ran into my house, pulled down all the shades, dropped the sheer curtains and called my sons to share what i had observed.  even as i type this report, my hair stands on end and i have cold chills!

on tues, oct. 25, around 7:30 pm, i noticed from my living room window (which faces in a northwest direction toward read mountain) a very bright white light hovering near and to the left of the mountain, close to where the other sightings had occurred, but somewhat lower in the sky.  i grabbed my binoculars to confirm what i thought i was seeing, and yes, it was another "object".  i called my eldest son who lives on the northwest side of read mountain and asked him to go outside to see if he could see it as well.  he could not see this object, so he said he would drive over to take a look from my house.  i promised my neighbor beside me that the next time i saw anything i would let her know so she and her teenage children could see as well, so i ran to her house, rang the doorbell and told her i had spotted another object hovering near the mountain.  i walked back to the street to continue my observation while waiting on them to join me.  within seconds of my seeing it again, it began moving in a northeast direction and seemed to be drop in altitude a little bit and disappeared behind the top ridge of the mountain.  i was disappointed thinking my neighbors would not get to see it...But, within seconds, it showed itself again, but this time it looked like it was tracking the high voltage power lines that are strung on the northwest side of the mountain.  the blue-white light became so bright, i could see the tree trunks as it passed behind them, and it looked as if the light illuminated the trees and ground as it passed along the ridge, under the tree line.  my neighbors joined me and i gave them my binoculars to observe this "object".  they got to observe the "object's" movement through the tree line; changing of colors (red, blue, yellowish orange and green), and the sparks of blue-white light (just like the ones i saw over the weekend).  the object finally rose above the mountain and began moving in our direct to the southeast.  it flew toward the falling creek estate area near vinton, and my neighbor said it just dropped straight down at great speed and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Second night in a row - - siting of vivid red light over read mountain in botetourt county, with others appearing at different times and locations.  largest one made me very uncomfortable!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car at 11:55pm at my local gamestop (waiting to purchase battlefield 3, over 150 people in line)

i was parked about 200 yards away from the main group.  i was leaning my head back with my sunroof all the way opened, gazing out at the stars.  red red wine began to play on the radio, i closed my eyes for a second and began to get into the song, when i noticed a very faint static disruption with the song.  i opened my eyes and it was directly overhead of me.  

the craft blended in perfectly with the dark.  i couldn't make out a shape at all.  i turned down my radio to hear the typical noise from a helicopter or plane or what not, but nothing was able to be heard.  i watched this thing fly in a straight path directly overhead of me for about 5 seconds.  i then stepped out of my car when it went out of view, and i lost sight of it instantly.  the thing was very inconspicuous.  no one in line saw it and no one heard a plane fly overhead at such a low altitude.  

it had 2 dim white lights that i can best explain as the fluorescent tube lights with cheap plastic covering them that you see in hospitals and schools and such.  i say this because the light seemed dim and dispersed rather than very bright.  the craft seemed very low in altitude, i'd say up to a maximum of 2,000 feet above me.  the lights were also not perpendicular with the direction of flight, they were not in line with one another.  

it was an odd experience, and it's definitely something that i wouldn't have expected to see.  i heard that the space station did pass over my area at around the same time.  i'd like to hear back from someone to confirm this, however my eyes seemed to think that it was low in altitude and most picture i've seen of the space station from earth have only 1 light.  also, the thing moved quite quickly or at least quicker than i believe the space station would, and it disappeared from view when i stepped out of my car and was no longer directly under it.
content.summary: Ufo 2 dim white lights, no noise, low altitude only noticeable from directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I woke up with my head turned to the side of my bed and opened my eyes to a being about 3 to 3-1/2 ft tall. the entity appeared to be female in orientation. "she" had her hair, which appeared to be black, pulled in to either a tight bun or pony tail behind her head. her skin appeared to be a dark olive tone. she wore clothes but i don't remember them in detail. i knew she was "otherworldly" because of her facial features. her eyes were small and completly black, she did not blink the entire time she was in my presence. her mouth was lip-less and in a straight line on her face; it was also slightly parted. she also had extreamly high cheek bones. her body did not move but she spoke to me telepathically. i don't remember what she said, but i do recall it was a repremand of some kind and that i replyed in a sarchastic manner. at no point did i feel afraid. my dog also acknowlaged the being. i after she spoke, i looked to the foot of my bed where my dog was running towards me. when i looked back to the being, she stayed visable for about 2 seconds then disappeared. because of her human like appearance i question wither or not this was a full blooded entity or a hybred. i had the overwhelming feeling that she was familier to me and that we were used to each other's presence. this is my first memorably run-in with a being however i've had several indications that something may be going on. just over a month ago, for instance, i found a red, freshly healed scoop mark on my inner thigh.
content.summary: I awoke to a child-like entity with dark, almost african hued skin.

content.detailedDescription: the ufo appeared as i was video recording my family at the lake. they were over the water. and one was hovering about 6 inches off the ground approx 50 yards in front of my vehicle which i didn't see as i was recording. only later did i see the ufo when i returned home did i notice something strange on the video.I could not see these objects with my naked eye only the camera was sensitive enough to capture them. i would like for some one to view this video and give me their opinion.
content.summary: Was captured on m 3g phone video. was not visible while i was video recording my family only notice later when i returned home that i noticed 3 ufo's one on the ground  one appeared in the clouds.
